dict.string: Xcode.Xcode3.ProjectTemplateUnitKind
com.apple.dt.unit.pageBasedApplication
This template provides a starting point for a page-based application that uses a page view controller.
languageChoice

[super viewWillAppear:animated]; self.dataLabel.text = [self.dataObject description];

- (NSUInteger)indexOfViewController:(DataViewController *)viewController;
